title: CONVERSE
overview:
Converse would like a :05 logo reveal animation to use on the end of videos they publish online in places like Social Media, YouTube, and possibly at the end of pre-roll ads. Looking for something high-end but authentic and can speak to the Converse brand.

*created through School of Motion. For educational purposes only.
deliverables:
• 3-4 Style Frames / Boards showing us the progression of the Logo Reveal
  • The logo should resolve with our Tagline, as well as social media icons
descriptors:
• Our tagline is: Shoes are Boring. Wear Sneakers.
  • Feature icons for Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Vine, and Google+.
metaDescription: Logan Rundquist's School of Motion Converse Project
